content.prompt: Which of the following describes the trend in crude oil imports to the United States between 1970 and 1980 as depicted in the graph?

choices.label: Crude oil imports declined to over 3 billion barrels in 1980.
Crude oil imports rose steadily to half a billion barrels in 1980.
Crude oil imports rose rapidly and then declined to about 2 billion barrels in 1980.
Crude oil imports declined rapidly to zero before recovering to 2.5 billion barrels in 1980.

topic.text: 8.13: The Environment and Natural Resources from 1968 to 1980

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
